content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'countrycodes' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'tgt')
CREATE TABLE tgt.countrycodes
	(
	 [iso3] nvarchar(4000),
	 [Country_Region] nvarchar(4000)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹                 
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_countrycodes
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO tgt.countrycodes
(iso3 1, Country_Region 2)
FROM 'https://azurediyauedls.dfs.core.windows.net/trusted/refined/CountryCodes'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM tgt.countrycodes
GO
